member.name: T:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient
member.summary: It is free to sign up and use the Pexels API. - Sign Up here: https://www.pexels.com - visit https://www.pexels.com/api/new/ to obtain your API key

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.SearchPhotosAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint enables you to search Pexels for any topic that you would like. For example your query could be something broad like 'Nature', 'Tigers', 'People'. Or it could be something specific like 'Group of people working'.
member.param: The search query. Ocean, Tigers, Pears, etc.

The locale of the search you are performing. The current supported locales are: 'en-US' 'pt-BR' 'es-ES' 'ca-ES' 'de-DE' 'it-IT' 'fr-FR' 'sv-SE' 'id-ID' 'pl-PL' 'ja-JP' 'zh-TW' 'zh-CN' 'ko-KR' 'th-TH' 'nl-NL' 'hu-HU' 'vi-VN' 'cs-CZ' 'da-DK' 'fi-FI' 'uk-UA' 'el-GR' 'ro-RO' 'nb-NO' 'sk-SK' 'tr-TR' 'ru-RU'.
The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.CollectionsAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint allows you to get all the collections you've created on Pexels.
member.param: The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.GetCollectionAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint gets the media of a specific collection.
member.param: The Collection Id
The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80
Filter results to a specific media type (`videos` or `photos`). Leave blank for all results.

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.CuratedPhotosAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint enables you to receive real-time photos curated by the Pexels team. We add at least one new photo per hour to our curated list so that you always get a changing selection of trending photos.
member.param: The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.GetPhotoAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a specific Photo from its id.
member.param: The id of the photo you are requesting.

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.SearchVideosAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint enables you to search Pexels for any topic that you would like. For example your query could be something broad like 'Nature', 'Tigers', 'People'. Or it could be something specific like 'Group of people working'.
member.param: The search query. Ocean, Tigers, Pears, etc.
The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80
The minimum width in pixels of the returned videos.
The minimum height in pixels of the returned videos.
The minimum duration in seconds of the returned videos.
The maximum duration in seconds of the returned videos.

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.PopularVideosAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint enables you to receive the current popular Pexels videos.
member.param: The number of the page you are requesting. Default: 1
The number of results you are requesting per page. Default: 15 Max: 80
The minimum width in pixels of the returned videos.
The minimum height in pixels of the returned videos.
The minimum duration in seconds of the returned videos.
The maximum duration in seconds of the returned videos.

member.name: M:PexelsDotNetSDK.Api.PexelsClient.GetVideoAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a specific Video from its id.
member.param: The id of the video you are requesting.
